sources.title: Common Law Wife (1963) CHICKEN FRIED CINEMA
sources.description:
It's Friday@PizzaFLIX
Stars: Lacey Kelly, Annabelle McAdams, Libby Hall
Dueling Directors: Larry Buchanan & Eric Sayers

When an aging sugar daddy throws out his long-term, live-in girlfriend and moves in his gold-digging niece, all hell breaks loose!

üçïTRIVIA: Libby Hall, the sister of Baby Doll in this film, is best remembered as the star of Larry Buchanan's Trash-da-Piece, The Naked Witchüçï

metadata.Plot: Shug, a rich old man, throws out his longtime live-in mistress and moves in his young, sexy niece, who's just returned home after making a living as a stripper in New Orleans. The mistress doesn't intend to go without a fight, however, and while Shug tries to make peace between the two women, he doesn't realize that his niece has her own plans for him.
metadata.Actors: Annabelle Weenick, George Edgley, Max W. Anderson
